description:
People in Albuquerque, New Mexico, who are injured as a result of driver negligence, medical malpractice or defective products need strong representation. At the Law Office of Christopher D. Lee, LLC, I am focused on partnering with clients throughout New Mexico who are involved in personal injury and wrongful death cases.


Since 2004, I have handled all types of personal injury and insurance claims, including wrongful death, automobile and trucking accidents, construction accidents, medical and legal malpractice, slip and fall accidents, insurance bad faith, motorcycle accidents, dog attacks, and products liability. I am committed to my clients and have successfully litigated million-dollar cases on their behalf.


As the victim of an accident, you may be suffering from serious injuries, which could make it difficult for you to return to work and enjoy living your life. You may be overwhelmed with medical expenses and wondering how you will be able to get back on your feet. My law office offers free initial consultations, during which I will carefully listen to the details of your situation. Together we will create a plan to help you get back on the path to financial and emotional recovery.
